project.name: Polygon Features
project.description: Tags used to detect if an OSM object is to be considered a polygon or a line. (As implemented in osmtogeojson and overpass turbo.)

tags.description: if area=no is present, a closed way is never be considered a polygon.
Multipolygon relations are always polygons.
Boundary relations are always polygons.
if this tag key is present, a closed way will be considered a polygon.

if this tag key is present, a closed way will be considered a polygon (except for some specific tag values).
doesn't trigger polygon detection, even though other values of the same tag key do.
